‚Äî Criteria for the other cross-divisional targets include in particular: market position compared to competitors, innovation performance (economic), development of the BMW

sentence:
W
Well-to-wheel
The well-to-wheel method takes into account the entire impact
chain behind vehicle motion ‚Äì from the generation and supply of
drivetrain power to its conversion into energy.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
This approach also
includes the environmental impacts associated with the supply
of energy.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
For example, to calculate the volume of upstream
emissions resulting from electric vehicles (providing power sup-
ply), the BMW Group uses the latest energy report published by
the International Energy Agency (IEA; reference base: previous
year) as a basis.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
As a result, this approach can be divided into
the following two components: the well-to-tank method takes
into account the carbon emissions in the supply chain, as well
as the upstream fuel supply from the oil well or point of power
generation.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
As such, this approach considers the impact chain
that arises until the energy is supplied to the vehicle, but does
not include the vehicle itself.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
By contrast, the tank-to-wheel
method takes into account the impact chain of energy received
(fuel, electricity) until it is converted into kinetic energy by the
vehicle.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
As such, this approach considers the impact chain that
arises during the use of the vehicle.
label: unlabeled
